footer.description: Welcome to Cabin Retreats, your go-to destination for booking the perfect cabin getaway. Whether you're seeking a peaceful retreat in the woods, a cozy mountain escape, or a lakeside cabin with breathtaking views, our platform offers a wide range of unique and charming cabins to suit every preference.

box.title: No matter where you’re going to, we’ll take you there
box.content: 2,500 people booked The Wild Oasis Event in last 24 hours

discover.heading: Discover More About Property Rental
discover.description: Escape the ordinary! Discover curates unique places to stay, hidden local experiences, trending destinations, and seasonal adventures. It's more than booking - it's your one-stop shop to spark your travel dreams and ignite your wanderlust. Dive in today!

contact.heading: Contact us
contact.description: Contact us at bookingapp@gmail.com or via the form bellow

greet.heading: Welcome to Booking App
greet.content: At Booking App, we believe that the perfect getaway is just a click away. Nestled in the heart of nature, our handpicked selection of cabins offers a retreat from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. Whether you’re seeking a romantic escape, a family adventure, or a solo retreat to recharge, our cabins provide the ideal setting for your unique experience.

story.heading: Our Story
story.content1: Booking App was founded with a simple mission: to connect people with nature. Our journey began when our founder, an avid nature enthusiast, struggled to find a reliable and curated platform for cabin rentals. Recognizing this gap, we decided to create a solution that combines the charm of rustic cabins with the convenience of modern technology.
story.content2: Since our inception, we have grown into a community of nature lovers, adventure seekers, and those in need of a serene escape. Our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction has remained at the forefront of our growth, ensuring that every stay with us is memorable and rejuvenating.

values.heading: Our Values
values.content1: Connection with Nature: We believe in the restorative power of nature and strive to offer locations that help you reconnect with the great outdoors.
values.content2: Sustainability: We are committed to promoting sustainable travel practices. Many of our cabins are eco-friendly, and we encourage our guests to respect and preserve the natural environments they visit.
values.content3: Community: Our guests are at the heart of everything we do. We value your feedback and continuously work to improve our offerings based on your experiences and suggestions.

community.heading: Join Our Community
community.content1: We invite you to explore our collection of cabins and discover the perfect retreat for your next getaway. Follow us on social media, sign up for our newsletter, and become a part of the Tranquil Cabins community. Share your stories, connect with fellow travelers, and be inspired by the beauty that surrounds us.
community.content2: Thank you for choosing Tranquil Cabins. Your adventure in nature awaits!

login.heading: Let's embark on a journey of stress-free bookings together
login.description: Booking App is a user-friendly booking platform designed to simplify the process of planning and booking various services and experiences. Whether you're looking to book flights, accommodations, activities, or events, Booking App provides a seamless and convenient solution for all your booking needs.

forgot-pwd.heading: Forget your password?
forgot-pwd.description1: Enter the email address you used when you joined and we'll send you instructions to reset your password.
forgot-pwd.description2: For security reasons, we do NOT store your password. So rest assured that we will never send your password via email.

verify.heading: Identity Verification
verify.description: Book with confidence on Booking App. Verify your ID for a safe & secure experience.

form.heading: Edit your profile
form.description: All the required user information can be added here...

delete-account.heading: Delete your account
delete-account.description1: Deleting your account gives you full control over your data and privacy. By choosing this option, you permanently remove your information from our platform, ensuring your online presence aligns with your preferences. It's a simple, transparent process designed to empower you
delete-account.description2: Your account will be deleted after 30 days, contact us for more information.

2fa.heading: Two-factor authentication
2fa.description: Keep your booking app account safe with two-factor authentication (2FA)! After entering your password, you'll receive a unique code via text or authentication app. This extra step ensures that only you can access your account, even if your password is compromised. Your security is our priority, so enable 2FA today for peace of mind every time you book.

empty.cabins: This cabin doesn't have any review yet
empty.users: You don't have any review yet

notifies.your-booked: You already have booked another cabin
